channel.title: Vimscript on Qiu's Quibble
channel.description: Recent content in Vimscript on Qiu's Quibble

item.title: Spectrum.vim - My first Vim plugin
item.description: ver the past few months, I’ve been using Vim as my primary development tool at work and at home, and I have to say, I’m addicted to it! I’m thinking about writing a blog post of why I get hooked on walking without crutches, but for this post, I’m just going to introduce you to my first plugin in Vim - Spectrum. Introduction Spectrum is a vim colorscheme roulette. Ever getting tired of staring at the same colorscheme every day?
